onset.Description: Onset of the go signal which is the disappearance of the cue bar

error_blank_hed_string.Description: Subject presses both buttons causing cue bar to start count-down display

Levels.cue: Subject presses both buttons causing cue bar to start count-down display
Levels.go: Bar disappears cueing the subject to make a choice about which hand to raise
Levels.right-raised: Subject releases right button and raises right hand
Levels.left-raised: Subject releases left button and raises left hand
Levels.left-raised-match: Subject raised left hand and computer presented image of left hand.
Levels.left-raised-nomatch: Subject raised left hand and computer presented image of right hand.
Levels.right-raised-match: Subject raised right hand and computer presented image of right hand.
Levels.right-raised-nomatch: Subject raised right hand and computer presented image of left hand.

HED.go: Description/Onset of the go signal which is the disappearance of the cue bar, Sensory-event, (Visual, Experimental-stimulus, Instructional, Rectangle/#)
HED.right-raised: Description/Subject raised right hand thereby releasing right button, (Agent-action, Experimental-participant, (Lift, (Right-side, Hand)), (Release, (Right-side, Button)))
HED.left-raised: Description/Subject raised left hand thereby releasing left button, (Agent-action, Experimental-participant, (Lift, (Left-side, Hand)), (Release, (Left-side, Button)))
HED.left-raised-match: Description/Computer presented image of left hand thereby matching a previously raised left hand, (Sensory-event, Visual, (Drawing, ID/left_hand.png,(Left-side, Hand)), (Feedback, (Intended-effect, Penalty)))
HED.left-raised-nomatch: Description/Computer presented image of left hand thereby not matching previously raised right hand, (Sensory-event, Visual, (Drawing, ID/right_hand.png, (Left-side, Hand)), (Feedback, (Intended-effect, Reward)))
HED.right-raised-match: Description/Computer presented image of right hand thereby matching a previously raised right hand, (Sensory-event, Visual, (Drawing, ID/right_hand.png,(Right-side, Hand)), (Feedback, (Intended-effect, Penalty)))
HED.right-raised-nomatch: Description/Computer presented image of right hand thereby not matching a previously raised left hand, (Sensory-event, Visual, (Drawing, ID/right_hand.png, (Right-side, Hand)), (Feedback, (Intended-effect, Reward)))

error_blank_dictionary.Description: Subject presses both buttons causing cue bar to start count-down display

Levels.cue: Subject presses both buttons causing cue bar to start count-down display
Levels.go: Bar disappears cueing the subject to make a choice about which hand to raise
Levels.right-raised: Subject releases right button and raises right hand
Levels.left-raised: Subject releases left button and raises left hand
Levels.left-raised-match: Subject raised left hand and computer presented image of left hand.
Levels.left-raised-nomatch: Subject raised left hand and computer presented image of right hand.
Levels.right-raised-match: Subject raised right hand and computer presented image of right hand.
Levels.right-raised-nomatch: Subject raised right hand and computer presented image of left hand.

trial.Description: The number of the trial in the experiment.
trial.HED: Description/The number of the trial in the experiment, (Experimental-trial, Item-count/#)

errors_blank_hed_string_and_unknown_type.Description: The number of the trial in the experiment.

error_trial_pass_list_as_hed.Description: The number of the trial in the experiment.

error_trial_pass_list_as_hed_dict.Description: The number of the trial in the experiment.
